heading: Non-Fungible Tokens: GIFs being sold for millions?
description: Well it's not like the world is falling short of outlandish concepts of monetizing, literally. The irksome recurrence of eccentric innovations is the new deal now, and yes, we're here to talk about one such in the party - Non-Fungible Tokens, or NFTs. These ensure that any/everthing that encompasses your digital existence can be monetized, tweets, art, music, GIFs, name it.

heading: Role of Insurance in Current Times
description: With the brutal impact of the second COVID wave, the spotlight has fallen on insurance agencies, with people looking to insure and protect their family and loved ones. What is the impact of the pandemic on insurance policies? Is there an insurance policy that covers the cost incurred if a person contracts the virus? Credit: Preet Ganatra

description: Is it really a match made in heaven? Or is it full of financial and environmental dissonance?

heading: How Content Marketing Helps to Make Money!
description: Certain strategies bring about a string of transformation to amply revolutionize how marketing impacts the audience. Content Marketing - a concept in the vanguard of this development, is indeed an exuberant answer to target market oriented, strategic, campaign stationed outlines.

heading: The Investment Show - Fundamentals of The Stock Market Part 4
description: P R Dilip founded Impetus Wealth Management on the 1st of December 1994. He has more than two decades of vast experience in the Indian Capital Market, managing the wealth of Ultra High Net worth Individuals, Non-Resident Indians, Corporate, Trust, and young Investors with a lot of aspirations but limited resources. Each one gets the most appropriate Investment Road Map based on the extensive Financial Profiling at Impetus. Tune in to listen to us talk about the stock market and how one must invest in it.

heading: On Her Terms: Entrepreneur and Managing Director - Urvija Srivastava
description: A graduate from University of Nottingham in Bachelors of Science with a Management Honors, our guest for today has also completed an executive education from Harvard Business School in strategy and finance and from Oxford in Marketing. Urvija Srivastava, founder of Urvija AI now has an order book of half a billion dollars spanning over the next 5 years. Tune in to listen to what it takes to run a company at such a young age!

heading: On Her Terms: Investment Analyst - Arpita Bhabhera
description: An alumnus of the London Business School and a Chartered Accountant, Arpita Bhabhera has also cleared all 3 levels of CFA. She is now climbing the ranks in investment management in London and is currently working at Alliance Bernstein’s concentrated global growth fund as an investment analyst. Listen to her talk about how she recognized her passion very early on and cultivated it to be where she is!

heading: On Her Terms : Digital Marketeer - Rini Antony
description: Rini is a 2019 passout of the MBA tech program from NMIMS with a specialisation in mechanical engineering and marketing. Rini and her team won the Google online marketing challenge in 2016. She has represented the country internationally at Harvard World MUN in 2015 & 2017 at Seoul & Montreal. She interned and now works full time at Google India as Search specialist at the Indian HQ in Hyderabad.

heading: On Her Terms: Environmental Manager - Urvi Talaty
description: A Yale fellow and research assistant, currently pursuing her Masters in Environmental Management while simultaneously assisting research for climate change communication at Yale University. Along with being the Assistant Chair at the Harvard World MUN, she also has had the experience of interning at the United Nations Environment programme and a passion for saving the environment from very early on. Listen to Urvi Talaty talk about her exciting journey of discovering her passion.

heading: On Her Terms: Pilot - Trishala Sonde
description:
The senior first officer of Vistara Airways, with 2500+ hours of flying and 4 years into aviation, we are very excited to hear Trishala Sonde talk about her journey through the clouds.

Listen to her talk about what made her choose this exciting career and how she soared into it!

heading: On Her Terms: Social Entrepreneur - Sumati Joshi
description: An upcoming Schwarzmann scholar, founder of Mission SanScar, an Alibaba Global Dreamer and a Resolution Fellow, Sumati Joshi is an inspiration for all. Listen to her unique and exciting foray into the social entrepreneurship space and what you can do to enter the same!
